ShortAbstract: This is a companion booklet to ‘Dependent Liberation’ by the same author.
AddInfo:
This is the first of two booklets in a series by Bhikkhu Brahmali.
Part 2 is: Dependent Liberation

DEPENDENT ORIGINATION:
(paṭiccasamuppāda)

ignorance/delusion (avijjā) ›
willed acts/activities (saṅkhāra) ›
consciousness (viññāṇa) ›
name and form (nāmarūpa) ›
the six senses (saḷāyatana) ›
contact/sense impressions (phassa) ›
sensations/feelings (vedanā) ›
desire/craving (taṇhā) ›
taking up (upādāna) ›
life/existence (bhava) ›
rebirth (jāti) ›
old age and death (jarāmaraṇa)
